017package org.microbean.type;
018
019import java.lang.reflect.GenericArrayType;
020import java.lang.reflect.ParameterizedType;
021import java.lang.reflect.Type;
022import java.lang.reflect.TypeVariable;
023import java.lang.reflect.WildcardType;
024
025import java.util.ArrayList;
026import java.util.Collection;
027import java.util.Collections;
028import java.util.List;
029import java.util.Objects;
030
031import java.util.function.BiPredicate;
032import java.util.function.Function;
033
034/**
035 * A {@link JavaType} with a flexible means of describing its direct
036 * supertypes, suitable only, probaly, for CDI use cases.
037 *
038 * <p>This is a <a
039 * href="https://docs.oracle.com/en/java/javase/17/docs/api/java.base/java/lang/doc-files/ValueBased.html">value-based</a>
040 * class.</p>
041 *
042 * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson"
043 * target="_parent">Laird Nelson</a>
044 */
045public final class CdiType extends JavaType {
046
047
048  /*
049   * Instance fields.
050   */
051
052
053  private final Function<? super Type, ? extends Collection<? extends Type>> directSupertypesFunction;
054
055
056  /*
057   * Constructors.
058   */
059
060
061  /**
062   * Creates a new {@link CdiType}.
063   *
064   * @param type the {@link Type} being modeled; must not be {@code
065   * null}; must be a <a
066   * href="https://jakarta.ee/specifications/cdi/3.0/jakarta-cdi-spec-3.0.html#legal_bean_types"
067   * target="_parent">legal CDI bean type</a>
068   *
069   * @param directSupertypesFunction a {@link Function} that, when
070   * supplied with a {@link Type} (which will be the {@code type}
071   * parameter value), returns those {@link Type}s which are its
072   * direct supertypes; must not be {@code null}
073   *
074   * @param supertypeAcceptancePredicate a {@link BiPredicate} gating
075   * a {@link Type}'s membership in the represented type's collection
076   * of {@linkplain #supertypes() supertypes} ({@linkplain
077   * #directSupertypes() direct} and {@linkplain #supertypes()
078   * otherwise}); may be {@code null}
079   *
080   * @exception NullPointerException if any argument is {@code null}
081   */
082  private CdiType(final Type type,
083                  final Function<? super Type, ? extends Collection<? extends Type>> directSupertypesFunction,
084                  final BiPredicate<? super Type, ? super Type> supertypeAcceptancePredicate) {
085    super(type, true, supertypeAcceptancePredicate);
086    this.directSupertypesFunction = Objects.requireNonNull(directSupertypesFunction, "directSupertypesFunction");
087  }
088
089
090  /*
091   * Instance methods.
092   */
093
094
095
096  /**
097   * If this {@link CdiType} represents a primitive type, returns a
098   * {@link CdiType} representing the corresponding "wrapper type", or
099   * this {@link CdiType} itself in all other cases.
100   *
101   * @return a {@link CdiType} representing the corresponding "wrapper
102   * type" where appropriate, or {@code this}
103   *
104   * @nullability This method does not, and its overrides must not,
105   * return {@code null}.
106   *
107   * @threadsafety This method is, and its overrides must be, safe for
108   * concurrent use by multiple threads.
109   *
110   * @idempotency This method is, and its overrides must be,
111   * idempotent and deterministic.
112   *
113   * @see JavaType#box()
114   */
115  @Override // JavaType
116  public CdiType box() {
117    final Type type = this.object();
118    if (type == void.class) {
119      return of(Void.class, this.directSupertypesFunction);
120    } else if (type == int.class) {
121      // This is such a ridiculously common case we avoid the map lookup
122      return of(Integer.class, this.directSupertypesFunction);
123    } else if (type instanceof Class<?> c && c.isPrimitive()) {
124      return of(wrapperTypes.get(c), this.directSupertypesFunction);
125    }
126    return this;
127  }
128
129  /**
130   * Returns an {@linkplain
131   * Collections#unmodifiableCollection(Collection) unmodifiable and
132   * immutable <code>Collection</code>} of the <em>direct
133   * supertypes</em> of this {@link CdiType} as provided by the
134   * {@linkplain #of(Type, Function, BiPredicate)
135   * <code>directSupertypesFunction</code> supplied at creation time}.
136   *
137   * @return an {@linkplain
138   * Collections#unmodifiableCollection(Collection) unmodifiable and
139   * immutable <code>Collection</code>} of the <em>direct
140   * supertypes</em> of this {@link JavaType}; never {@code null}
141   *
142   * @nullability This method does not, and its overrides must not,
143   * return {@code null}.
144   *
145   * @threadsafety This method is, and its overrides must be, safe for
146   * concurrent use by multiple threads.
147   *
148   * @idempotency This method is, and its overrides must be,
149   * idempotent and deterministic, though the ordering of elements
150   * within returned {@link Collection}s is undefined
151   */
152  @Override
153  public Collection<? extends JavaType> directSupertypes() {
154    final Collection<? extends Type> directSupertypes = this.directSupertypesFunction.apply(this.object());
155    if (directSupertypes != null && !directSupertypes.isEmpty()) {
156      final Collection<JavaType> c = new ArrayList<>(directSupertypes.size());
157      for (final Type type : directSupertypes) {
158        c.add(of(type, this.directSupertypesFunction));
159      }
160      return Collections.unmodifiableCollection(c);
161    }
162    return List.of();
163  }
164
165  /**
166   * If this {@link CdiType} represents a {@link ParameterizedType} or
167   * a {@link GenericArrayType} returns a {@link CdiType} representing
168   * its {@linkplain ParameterizedType#getRawType() raw type} or
169   * {@linkplain GenericArrayType#getGenericComponentType() generic
170   * component type}, or, if this {@link CdiType} does not represent a
171   * {@link ParameterizedType} or a {@link GenericArrayType}, returns
172   * {@code this}.
173   *
174   * @return a suitable {@link CdiType}; never {@code null}; often
175   * {@code this}
176   *
177   * @nullability This method does not, and its overrides must not,
178   * return {@code null}.
179   *
180   * @threadsafety This method is, and its overrides must be, safe for
181   * concurrent use by multiple threads.
182   *
183   * @idempotency This method is, and its overrides must be,
184   * idempotent and deterministic.
185   */
186  @Override // JavaType
187  public CdiType type() {
188    final Type type = this.object();
189    if (type instanceof ParameterizedType p) {
190      return of(p.getRawType(), this.directSupertypesFunction);
191    } else if (type instanceof GenericArrayType g) {
192      return of(g.getGenericComponentType(), this.directSupertypesFunction);
193    } else {
194      return this;
195    }
196  }
197
198  /**
199   * Returns an {@linkplain Collections#unmodifiableList(List)
200   * unmodifiable <code>List</code>} of this {@link CdiType}'s type
201   * arguments.
202   *
203   * <p>The returned {@link List} will be {@linkplain List#isEmpty()
204   * non-empty} if and only if this {@link CdiType} models a
205   * {@link ParameterizedType}.</p>
206   *
207   * @return an {@linkplain Collections#unmodifiableList(List)
208   * unmodifiable <code>List</code>} of this {@link CdiType}'s
209   * {@linkplain ParameterizedType#getActualTypeArguments() type
210   * arguments}; never {@code null}
211   *
212   * @nullability This method does not, and its overrides must not,
213   * return {@code null}.
214   *
215   * @threadsafety This method is, and its overrides must be, safe for
216   * concurrent use by multiple threads.
217   *
218   * @idempotency This method is, and its overrides must be,
219   * idempotent and deterministic.
220   */
221  @Override // org.microbean.type.Type<Type>
222  public List<? extends CdiType> typeArguments() {
223    if (this.object() instanceof ParameterizedType p) {
224      final Type[] typeArguments = p.getActualTypeArguments();
225      final List<CdiType> typeArgumentsList = new ArrayList<>(typeArguments.length);
226      for (final Type typeArgument : typeArguments) {
227        typeArgumentsList.add(of(typeArgument, this.directSupertypesFunction));
228      }
229      return Collections.unmodifiableList(typeArgumentsList);
230    }
231    return List.of();
232  }
233
234  /**
235   * Returns an {@linkplain Collections#unmodifiableList(List)
236   * unmodifiable <code>List</code>} of this {@link CdiType}'s type
237   * parameters.
238   *
239   * <p>The returned {@link List} will be {@linkplain List#isEmpty()
240   * non-empty} if and only if this {@link CdiType} models a generic
241   * {@link Class}.</p>
242   *
243   * @return an {@linkplain Collections#unmodifiableList(List)
244   * unmodifiable <code>List</code>} of this {@link CdiType}'s
245   * {@linkplain Class#getTypeParameters() type parameters}; never
246   * {@code null}
247   *
248   * @nullability This method does not, and its overrides must not,
249   * return {@code null}.
250   *
251   * @threadsafety This method is, and its overrides must be, safe for
252   * concurrent use by multiple threads.
253   *
254   * @idempotency This method is, and its overrides must be,
255   * idempotent and deterministic.
256   */
257  @Override // org.microbean.type.Type<Type>
258  public List<? extends CdiType> typeParameters() {
259    if (this.object() instanceof Class<?> c) {
260      final Type[] typeParameters = c.getTypeParameters();
261      if (typeParameters.length > 0) {
262        final List<CdiType> typeParametersList = new ArrayList<>(typeParameters.length);
263        for (final Type typeParameter : typeParameters) {
264          typeParametersList.add(of(typeParameter, this.directSupertypesFunction));
265        }
266        return Collections.unmodifiableList(typeParametersList);
267      }
268    }
269    return List.of();
270  }
271
272  /**
273   * Returns the {@linkplain Class#getComponentType() component type}
274   * of this {@link CdiType}, if there is one, <strong>or {@code
275   * null} if there is not</strong>.
276   *
277   * <p>This method returns a non-{@code null} result only when this
278   * {@link CdiType} represents a {@link Type} that is either
279   * {@linkplain Class#isArray() an array} or a {@link
280   * GenericArrayType}.</p>
281   *
282   * @return the {@linkplain Class#getComponentType() component type}
283   * of this {@link CdiType}, if there is one, or {@code null} if
284   * there is not
285   *
286   * @nullability This method and its overrides may return null.
287   *
288   * @threadsafety This method is, and its overrides must be, safe for
289   * concurrent use by multiple threads.
290   *
291   * @idempotency This method is, and its overrides must be,
292   * idempotent and deterministic.
293   *
294   * @see Class#getComponentType()
295   *
296   * @see GenericArrayType#getGenericComponentType()
297   */
298  @Override // org.microbean.type.Type<Type>
299  public CdiType componentType() {
300    final Type newType;
301    final Type type = this.object();
302    if (type instanceof Class<?> c) {
303      newType = c.getComponentType();
304    } else if (type instanceof GenericArrayType g) {
305      newType = g.getGenericComponentType();
306    } else {
307      newType = null;
308    }
309    if (newType == null) {
310      return null;
311    }
312    return of(newType, this.directSupertypesFunction);
313  }
314
315  /**
316   * Returns an {@linkplain Collections#unmodifiableList(List)
317   * unmodifiable <code>List</code>} of this {@link CdiType}'s lower
318   * bounds.
319   *
320   * <p>The returned {@link List} will be {@linkplain List#isEmpty()
321   * non-empty} if and only if this {@link Type} models a {@link
322   * WildcardType} {@linkplain WildcardType#getLowerBounds() with a
323   * lower bound}.</p>
324   *
325   * <p>The returned {@link List} will contain at most one
326   * element.</p>
327   *
328   * @return an {@linkplain Collections#unmodifiableList(List)
329   * unmodifiable <code>List</code>} of this {@link CdiType}'s lower
330   * bounds; never {@code null}; often {@linkplain List#isEmpty()
331   * empty}
332   *
333   * @nullability This method does not, and its overrides must not,
334   * return {@code null}.
335   *
336   * @threadsafety This method is, and its overrides must be, safe for
337   * concurrent use by multiple threads.
338   *
339   * @idempotency This method is, and its overrides must be,
340   * idempotent and deterministic.
341   *
342   * @see WildcardType#getLowerBounds()
343   */
344  @Override // org.microbean.type.Type<Type>
345  public List<? extends CdiType> lowerBounds() {
346    final Type type = this.object();
347    if (type instanceof WildcardType w) {
348      final Type[] lowerBounds = w.getLowerBounds();
349      if (lowerBounds.length > 0) {
350        final List<CdiType> lowerBoundsList = new ArrayList<>(lowerBounds.length);
351        for (final Type lowerBound : lowerBounds) {
352          lowerBoundsList.add(of(lowerBound, this.directSupertypesFunction));
353        }
354        return Collections.unmodifiableList(lowerBoundsList);
355      }
356    }
357    return List.of();
358  }
359
360  /**
361   * Returns an {@linkplain Collections#unmodifiableList(List)
362   * unmodifiable <code>List</code>} of this {@link CdiType}'s upper
363   * bounds.
364   *
365   * <p>The returned {@link List} will be {@linkplain List#isEmpty()
366   * non-empty} if and only if this {@link Type} models either a {@link
367   * WildcardType} or a {@link TypeVariable}.
368   *
369   * <p>The returned {@link List} will contain at most one
370   * element.</p>
371   *
372   * @return an {@linkplain Collections#unmodifiableList(List)
373   * unmodifiable <code>List</code>} of this {@link CdiType}'s lower
374   * bounds; never {@code null}; often {@linkplain List#isEmpty()
375   * empty}
376   *
377   * @nullability This method does not, and its overrides must not,
378   * return {@code null}.
379   *
380   * @threadsafety This method is, and its overrides must be, safe for
381   * concurrent use by multiple threads.
382   *
383   * @idempotency This method is, and its overrides must be,
384   * idempotent and deterministic.
385   *
386   * @see TypeVariable#getBounds()
387   *
388   * @see WildcardType#getUpperBounds()
389   */
390  @Override // org.microbean.type.Type<Type>
391  public List<? extends CdiType> upperBounds() {
392    final Type type = this.object();
393    if (type instanceof WildcardType w) {
394      return List.of(of(w.getUpperBounds()[0], this.directSupertypesFunction));
395    } else if (type instanceof TypeVariable<?> t) {
396      final Type[] upperBounds = t.getBounds();
397      switch (upperBounds.length) {
398      case 0:
399        throw new AssertionError();
400      case 1:
401        return List.of(of(upperBounds[0], this.directSupertypesFunction));
402      default:
403        final List<CdiType> upperBoundsList = new ArrayList<>(upperBounds.length);
404        for (final Type upperBound : upperBounds) {
405          upperBoundsList.add(of(upperBound, this.directSupertypesFunction));
406        }
407        return Collections.unmodifiableList(upperBoundsList);
408      }
409    } else {
410      return List.of();
411    }
412  }
413
414  /**
415   * Returns all the supertypes of this {@link CdiType} (which
416   * includes this {@link CdiType}).
417   *
418   * <p>This method reflexively and transitively applies the direct
419   * supertype relation (represented by the {@link
420   * #directSupertypes()} method) to this {@link CdiType} and returns
421   * an {@linkplain Collections#unmodifiableCollection(Collection)
422   * unmodifiable <code>Collection</code>} containing the result.</p>
423   *
424   * <p>Overrides which alter this algorithm may result in undefined
425   * behavior.  Typically overriding is necessary only to refine the
426   * return type of this method.</p>
427   *
428   * @return an {@linkplain
429   * Collections#unmodifiableCollection(Collection) unmodifiable
430   * <code>Collection</code>} containing all the supertypes of this
431   * {@link Type} (which includes this {@link CdiType}); never {@code
432   * null}
433   *
434   * @nullability This method does not, and its overrides must not,
435   * return {@code null}.
436   *
437   * @idempotency This method is, and its overrides must be,
438   * idempotent and deterministic.
439   *
440   * @threadsafety This method is, and its overrides must be, safe for
441   * concurrent use by multiple threads.
442   *
443   * @see #directSupertypes()
444   */
445  @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
446  public Collection<? extends CdiType> supertypes() {
447    return (Collection<? extends CdiType>)super.supertypes();
448  }
449
450
451  /*
452   * Static methods.
453   */
454
455
456  /**
457   * Creates a new {@link CdiType}.
458   *
459   * @param type a {@link Token} representing the type to model; must
460   * not be {@code null}
461   *
462   * @return a new {@link CdiType}; never {@code null}
463   *
464   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code type} is {@code null}.
465   *
466   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
467   *
468   * @idempotency This method is idempotent but not deterministic (in
469   * that it returns a new {@link CdiType} with each invocation).
470   * However, any {@link CdiType} returned from this method is
471   * guaranteed to {@linkplain #equals(Object) equal} any other {@link
472   * CdiType} returned from this method, provided the inputs to all
473   * invocations are equal.
474   *
475   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
476   * threads.
477   *
478   * @see #of(Type)
479   */
480  public static final CdiType of(final Token<?> type) {
481    return of(type.type(), JavaTypes::directSupertypes, JavaTypes::acceptAll);
482  }
483
484  /**
485   * Creates a new {@link CdiType}.
486   *
487   * @param type a {@link Token} representing the type to model; must
488   * not be {@code null}
489   *
490   * @param directSupertypesFunction a {@link Function} that, when
491   * supplied with a {@link Type} (which will be the {@code type}
492   * parameter value), returns those {@link Type}s which are its
493   * direct supertypes; must not be {@code null}
494   *
495   * @return a new {@link CdiType}; never {@code null}
496   *
497   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code type} is {@code null}.
498   *
499   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
500   *
501   * @idempotency This method is idempotent but not deterministic (in
502   * that it returns a new {@link CdiType} with each invocation).
503   * However, any {@link CdiType} returned from this method is
504   * guaranteed to {@linkplain #equals(Object) equal} any other {@link
505   * CdiType} returned from this method, provided the inputs to all
506   * invocations are equal.
507   *
508   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
509   * threads.
510   *
511   * @see #of(Type)
512   */
513  public static final CdiType of(final Token<?> type,
514                                 final Function<? super Type, ? extends Collection<? extends Type>> directSupertypesFunction) {
515    return of(type.type(), directSupertypesFunction, JavaTypes::acceptAll);
516  }
517
518  /**
519   * Creates a new {@link CdiType}.
520   *
521   * @param type a {@link Token} representing the type to model; must
522   * not be {@code null}
523   *
524   * @param box whether autoboxing is enabled; <strong>must be {@code
525   * true} because CDI requires autoboxing</strong>; see {@link
526   * JavaType#of(Token, boolean)} which this method shadows
527   *
528   * @return a new {@link CdiType}; never {@code null}
529   *
530   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code type} is {@code null}.
531   *
532   * @exception IllegalArgumentException if {@code box} is {@code
533   * false}; CDI requires autoboxing
534   *
535   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
536   *
537   * @idempotency This method is idempotent but not deterministic (in
538   * that it returns a new {@link CdiType} with each invocation).
539   * However, any {@link CdiType} returned from this method is
540   * guaranteed to {@linkplain #equals(Object) equal} any other {@link
541   * CdiType} returned from this method, provided the inputs to all
542   * invocations are equal.
543   *
544   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
545   * threads.
546   *
547   * @see #of(Type)
548   */
549  public static final CdiType of(final Token<?> type, final boolean box) {
550    if (!box) {
551      throw new IllegalArgumentException("!box; boxing is required by CDI");
552    }
553    return of(type.type(), JavaTypes::directSupertypes, JavaTypes::acceptAll);
554  }
555
556  /**
557   * Returns a {@link CdiType} representing the supplied {@code type}.
558   *
559   * @param type the {@link Type} that will be modeled; must not be
560   * {@code null}
561   *
562   * @param box whether autoboxing is enabled; <strong>must be {@code
563   * true} because CDI requires autoboxing</strong>; see {@link
564   * JavaType#of(Type, boolean)} which this method effectively shadows
565   *
566   * @return a {@link CdiType}; never {@code null}
567   *
568   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code type} is {@code null}.
569   *
570   * @exception IllegalArgumentException if {@code box} is {@code
571   * false}; CDI requires autoboxing
572   *
573   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
574   *
575   * @idempotency This method is idempotent but not deterministic (in
576   * that it may return a new {@link CdiType} with each invocation).
577   * However, any {@link CdiType} returned from this method is
578   * guaranteed to {@linkplain #equals(Object) equal} any other {@link
579   * CdiType} returned from this method, provided the inputs to all
580   * invocations are equal.
581   *
582   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
583   * threads.
584   *
585   * @see #of(Type)
586   */
587  public static final CdiType of(final Type type, final boolean box) {
588    if (!box) {
589      throw new IllegalArgumentException("boxing is required by CDI");
590    }
591    return of(type, JavaTypes::directSupertypes, JavaTypes::acceptAll);
592  }
593
594  /**
595   * Returns a {@link CdiType} representing the supplied {@code type}.
596   *
597   * @param type the {@link Type} that will be modeled; must not be
598   * {@code null}
599   *
600   * @return a {@link CdiType}; never {@code null}
601   *
602   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code type} is {@code null}.
603   *
604   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
605   *
606   * @idempotency This method is idempotent but not deterministic (in
607   * that it may return a new {@link CdiType} with each invocation).
608   * However, any {@link CdiType} returned from this method is
609   * guaranteed to {@linkplain #equals(Object) equal} any other {@link
610   * CdiType} returned from this method, provided the inputs to all
611   * invocations are equal.
612   *
613   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
614   * threads.
615   */
616  public static final CdiType of(final Type type) {
617    return of(type, JavaTypes::directSupertypes, JavaTypes::acceptAll);
618  }
619
620  /**
621   * Returns a {@link CdiType} representing the supplied {@code type}.
622   *
623   * @param type the {@link Type} that will be modeled; must not be
624   * {@code null}
625   *
626   * @param directSupertypesFunction a {@link Function} that, when
627   * supplied with a {@link Type} (which will be the {@code type}
628   * parameter value), returns those {@link Type}s which are its
629   * direct supertypes; must not be {@code null}
630   *
631   * @return a {@link CdiType}; never {@code null}
632   *
633   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code type} is {@code null}.
634   *
635   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
636   *
637   * @idempotency This method is idempotent but not deterministic (in
638   * that it may return a new {@link CdiType} with each invocation).
639   * However, any {@link CdiType} returned from this method is
640   * guaranteed to {@linkplain #equals(Object) equal} any other {@link
641   * CdiType} returned from this method, provided the inputs to all
642   * invocations are equal.
643   *
644   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
645   * threads.
646   */
647  public static final CdiType of(final Type type,
648                                 final Function<? super Type, ? extends Collection<? extends Type>> directSupertypesFunction) {
649    return of(type, directSupertypesFunction, JavaTypes::acceptAll);
650  }
651
652  /**
653   * Returns a {@link CdiType} representing the supplied {@code type}.
654   *
655   * @param type the {@link Type} that will be modeled; must not be
656   * {@code null}
657   *
658   * @param directSupertypesFunction a {@link Function} that, when
659   * supplied with a {@link Type} (which will be the {@code type}
660   * parameter value), returns those {@link Type}s which are its
661   * direct supertypes; must not be {@code null}
662   *
663   * @param supertypeAcceptancePredicate a {@link BiPredicate} gating
664   * a {@link Type}'s membership in the represented type's collection
665   * of {@linkplain #supertypes() supertypes} ({@linkplain
666   * #directSupertypes() direct} and {@linkplain #supertypes()
667   * otherwise}); may be {@code null}
668   *
669   * @return a {@link CdiType}; never {@code null}
670   *
671   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code type} is {@code null}.
672   *
673   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
674   *
675   * @idempotency This method is idempotent but not deterministic (in
676   * that it may return a new {@link CdiType} with each invocation).
677   * However, any {@link CdiType} returned from this method is
678   * guaranteed to {@linkplain #equals(Object) equal} any other {@link
679   * CdiType} returned from this method, provided the inputs to all
680   * invocations are equal.
681   *
682   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
683   * threads.
684   */
685  public static final CdiType of(final Type type,
686                                 final Function<? super Type, ? extends Collection<? extends Type>> directSupertypesFunction,
687                                 final BiPredicate<? super Type, ? super Type> supertypeAcceptancePredicate) {
688    return new CdiType(type, directSupertypesFunction, supertypeAcceptancePredicate);
689  }
690
691  /**
692   * Returns a {@link CdiType} <strong>with no direct
693   * supertypes</strong> representing the supplied {@code type}.
694   *
695   * @param type the {@link Type} that will be modeled; must not be
696   * {@code null}
697   *
698   * @return a {@link CdiType} <strong>with no direct
699   * supertypes</strong>; never {@code null}
700   *
701   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code type} is {@code null}.
702   *
703   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
704   *
705   * @idempotency This method is idempotent but not deterministic (in
706   * that it may return a new {@link CdiType} with each invocation).
707   * However, any {@link CdiType} returned from this method is
708   * guaranteed to {@linkplain #equals(Object) equal} any other {@link
709   * CdiType} returned from this method, provided the inputs to all
710   * invocations are equal.
711   *
712   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
713   * threads.
714   */
715  public static final CdiType ofExact(final Type type) {
716    return of(type, t -> List.of(), (sub, sup) -> sub == sup);
717  }
718
719}
